page.title: 14WATERSIDE HOUSE FARM
page.content: {Waterside House Farm}is rented from the Duke by{Mr.Mellor.}Some of the farm buildings are 150 years old but some are only 14 years.He has lived there for 21 years.He farms 360 acres and there is no waste or woodland.He has barley,oil seed rape,peas,and other root crops but he specialises in{pigs.}He keeps 140 sows,7 boars and produces 3500 piglets each year.The type of pig that{ {Mr.Mellor}breeds is {large whites.}His pigs live in a large pig unit.He feeds them barley meal and a concentrate. He fattens some of his pigs up for slaughter.He does not buy any sows or allow other people to bring their pigs to his farm incase of disease.Instead he keeps the best of the sow piglets for breeding. When he retires he hopes to hand the tenancy of the farm down to his children.{
